_GetWatchlist.body: union Watchlist, ConfidentialWatchlist | where TimeGenerated < now() | where _DTItemType == 'watchlist-item' | where WatchlistAlias == watchlistAlias | summarize hint.shufflekey=_DTItemId arg_max(_DTTimestamp, _DTItemStatus, LastUpdatedTimeUTC, SearchKey, WatchlistItem) by _DTItemId | where _DTItemStatus != 'Delete' | project-away _DTTimestamp, _DTItemStatus | evaluate bag_unpack(WatchlistItem)
